attributes.action: Say NO to sharia bonds in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
Hello there this is an issue that as a county we should avoid reasons why:

To have Sharia bonds you must implement parts of the الشريعة (Sharia law).

This barbaric law:

Allows female genital mutilation.
Death to homosexuals.
Death for leaving Islam for other religions.
The list goes on..


If we show the world we are willing to accept even one part of Sharia we show them we agree with the above list plus more sickening laws.


we want our government to say NO there is no place for Sharia in this county and we don't care how much money you have we believe human life is worth more.

we are a great county who have helped many people in the world we said no to Hitler and we should say no to anything that involves any part of this barbaric law.

So i plead with you please don't do this, brave men and women have died for our right so laws like this could be cut out from our county.
